actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exempt from the provisions of the Airport and Airways Revenue Act of 1970, helicopters which are not operated on an established line.

summary.text: Exempts from the provisions of the Airport and Airways Revenue Act of 1970 helicopters which are not operated on an established line.

titles.title: A bill to exempt from the provisions of the Airport and Airways Revenue Act of 1970, helicopters which are not operated on an established line.
